parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets background color of given control. Only affects:
* [[CT_COMBO]]
* [[CT_STATIC]]
* [[CT_STRUCTURED_TEXT]]
* [[CT_MAP]]
* [[CT_MAP_MAIN]]
* [[CT_BUTTON]] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.01</value></part></template>
* [[CT_SHORTCUTBUTTON]] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.01</value></part></template>
* [[CT_ACTIVETEXT]] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.01</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetBackgroundColor''' color

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] (format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]])

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetBackgroundColor]] [1, 0, 0, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allControls]], [[allDisplays]], [[controlsGroupCtrl]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]], [[displayParent]]
</value></part></template>
